snippet: Illumina and two investment firms are spending $100 million on Helix, which has been in the works for more than a year.
abstract: DealBook Online; Illumina, Warburg Pincus and Sutter Hill Ventures will invest around $100 million each in new venture Helix, which will serve as hub for range of analytic businesses associated with gene-sequencing.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. de la MERCED

lead_paragraph: Illumina and two investment firms are spending $100 million on Helix, which has been in the works for more than a year.

headline.main: Helix, a New Gene Sequencing Venture, Aims to Create Digital Hub for Genomics
